00035 /* prototypes for communication functions */
00036 void sl811_init();
00037 void sl811_reset();
00038 void sl811_write(u8 addr, u8 data);
00039 u8 sl811_read(u8 addr);
00040 
00041 void sl811_write_burst(u8 data);
00042 u8 sl811_read_burst();
00043 
00044 void sl811_write_buf(u8 addr, unsigned char *buffer,u8 size);
00045 void sl811_read_buf(u8 addr, unsigned char *buffer,u8 size);

00047 /*
00048  *  * ScanLogic SL811HS/T USB Host Controller
00049  *   */
00050 
00051 #define SL811_IDX_ADDR (0x00)
00052 #define SL811_IDX_DATA (0x01)
00053 #define SL811_PORTSIZE (0x02)
00054 
00055 #define SL811_E0BASE (0x00)    /* Base of Control0 */
00056 #define SL811_E0CTRL (0x00)    /* Host Control Register */
00057 #define SL811_E0ADDR (0x01)    /* Host Base Address */
00058 #define SL811_E0LEN  (0x02)    /* Host Base Length */
00059 #define SL811_E0STAT (0x03)    /* USB Status (Read) */
00060 #define SL811_E0PID  SL811_E0STAT       /* Host PID, Device Endpoint (Write) */
00061 #define SL811_E0CONT (0x04)    /* Transfer Count (Read) */
00062 #define SL811_E0DEV  SL811_E0CONT       /* Host Device Address (Write) */
00063 
00064 #define SL811_E1BASE (0x08)    /* Base of Control1 */
00065 #define SL811_E1CTRL (SL811_E1BASE + SL811_E0CTRL)
00066 #define SL811_E1ADDR (SL811_E1BASE + SL811_E0ADDR)
00067 #define SL811_E1LEN  (SL811_E1BASE + SL811_E0LEN)
00068 #define SL811_E1STAT (SL811_E1BASE + SL811_E0STAT)
00069 #define SL811_E1PID  (SL811_E1BASE + SL811_E0PID)
00070 #define SL811_E1CONT (SL811_E1BASE + SL811_E0CONT)
00071 #define SL811_E1DEV  (SL811_E1BASE + SL811_E0DEV)
00072 
00073 #define SL811_CTRL (0x05)    /* Control Register1 */
00074 #define SL811_IER  (0x06)    /* Interrupt Enable Register */
00075 #define SL811_ISR  (0x0d)    /* Interrupt Status Register */
00076 #define SL811_DATA (0x0e)    /* SOF Counter Low (Write) */
00077 #define SL811_REV  SL811_DATA /* HW Revision Register (Read) */
00078 #define SL811_CSOF  (0x0f)    /* SOF Counter High(R), Control2(W) */
00079 #define SL811_MEM  (0x10)    /* Memory Buffer (0x10 - 0xff) */
00080 
00081 #define SL811_EPCTRL_ARM          (0x01)
00082 #define SL811_EPCTRL_ENABLE  (0x02)
00083 #define SL811_EPCTRL_DIRECTION (0x04)
00084 #define SL811_EPCTRL_ISO          (0x10)
00085 #define SL811_EPCTRL_SOF          (0x20)
00086 #define SL811_EPCTRL_DATATOGGLE (0x40)
00087 #define SL811_EPCTRL_PREAMBLE  (0x80)
00088 
00089 #define SL811_EPPID_PIDMASK  (0xf0)
00090 #define SL811_EPPID_EPMASK (0x0f)
00091 
00092 #define SL811_EPSTAT_ACK          (0x01)
00093 #define SL811_EPSTAT_ERROR (0x02)
00094 #define SL811_EPSTAT_TIMEOUT (0x04)
00095 #define SL811_EPSTAT_SEQUENCE  (0x08)
00096 #define SL811_EPSTAT_SETUP (0x10)
00097 #define SL811_EPSTAT_OVERFLOW  (0x20)
00098 #define SL811_EPSTAT_NAK          (0x40)
00099 #define SL811_EPSTAT_STALL (0x80)
00100 
00101 #define SL811_CTRL_ENABLESOF (0x01)
00102 #define SL811_CTRL_EOF2   (0x04)
00103 #define SL811_CTRL_RESETENGINE (0x08)
00104 #define SL811_CTRL_JKSTATE (0x10)
00105 #define SL811_CTRL_LOWSPEED  (0x20)
00106 #define SL811_CTRL_SUSPEND (0x40)
00107 
00108 #define SL811_IER_USBA  (0x01)  /* USB-A done */
00109 #define SL811_IER_USBB  (0x02)  /* USB-B done */
00110 #define SL811_IER_BABBLE          (0x04)  /* Babble detection */
00111 #define SL811_IER_SOFTIMER (0x10)  /* 1ms SOF timer */
00112 #define SL811_IER_INSERT          (0x20)  /* Slave Insert/Remove detection */
00113 #define SL811_IER_RESET   (0x40)  /* USB Reset/Resume */
00114 
00115 #define SL811_ISR_USBA  (0x01)  /* USB-A done */
00116 #define SL811_ISR_USBB  (0x02)  /* USB-B done */
00117 #define SL811_ISR_BABBLE          (0x04)  /* Babble detection */
00118 #define SL811_ISR_SOFTIMER (0x10)  /* 1ms SOF timer */
00119 #define SL811_ISR_INSERT          (0x20)  /* Slave Insert/Remove detection */
00120 #define SL811_ISR_RESET   (0x40)  /* USB Reset/Resume */
00121 #define SL811_ISR_DATA  (0x80)  /* Value of the Data+ pin */
00122 
00123 #define SL811_REV_USBA  (0x01)  /* USB-A */
00124 #define SL811_REV_USBB  (0x02)  /* USB-B */
00125 #define SL811_REV_REVMASK  (0xf0)  /* HW Revision */
00126 #define SL811_REV_REVSL811H (0x00)  /* HW is SL811H */
00127 #define SL811_REV_REVSL811HS (0x10)  /* HW is SL811HS */
00128 
00129 #define SL811_CSOF_SOFMASK  (0x3f)  /* SOF High Counter */
00130 #define SL811_CSOF_POLARITY (0x40)  /* Change polarity */
00131 #define SL811_CSOF_MASTER (0x80)  /* Master/Slave selection */
00132 
00133 
00134 #define cMemStart 0x10
00135 #define ubufA     0x80
00136 #define ubufB     0xc0
00137 #define uxferLen  0x40
00138 #define sMemSize  0xc0
00139 #define cMemEnd   256
00140 
00141 
00142 #define EP0Buf  0x40
00143 #define EP0Len  0x40
00144 
00145 #define DATA0_WR  0x07
00146 #define DATA1_WR  0x47
00147 
00148 #define ZDATA0_WR 0x05
00149 #define ZDATA1_WR 0x45
00150 
00151 #define DATA0_RD  0x03
00152 #define DATA1_RD  0x43
00153 
00154 #define PID_SOF   0x50
00155 #define PID_SETUP 0xd0
00156 #define PID_IN    0x90
00157 #define PID_OUT   0x10
00158 #define PID_PRE   0xc0
00159 #define PID_NAK   0xa0
00160 #define PID_STALL 0xe0
00161 #define PID_DATA0 0x30
00162 #define PID_DATA1 0xb0
